  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String login, String password, String name) throws LoginSenhaInvalidsException

      Constructs a new User in the Jackut system.

      Initializes a Profile for the user, along with lists for friends, sent friend requests, and received friend requests.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login.
      password - User's password.
      name - User's name.
      Throws:
      LoginSenhaInvalidsException - Exception thrown if the login or password is invalid.
      See Also:
      • Profile

  • Method Details

    • getLogin

      public String getLogin()

      Gets the user's login.

      Returns:
      User's login.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the user.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The user's login.

    • verificarSenha

      public boolean verificarSenha(String password)

      Checks if the provided password matches the user's password.

      Parameters:
      password - Password to be verified.
      Returns:
      True if the passwords match, false otherwise.

    • getAtributo

      public String getAtributo(String attribute) throws AttributeNotFilledException

      Gets the value of a user's attribute.

      If the attribute is "name," it returns the user's name.

      Parameters:
      attribute - Attribute to be returned.
      Returns:
      Value of the attribute.
      Throws:
      AttributeNotFilledException - Exception thrown if the attribute has not been filled.

      Parameters:

    • getAmigosString

      public String getAmigosString()

      Returns the list of friends of the user as a formatted string.

      The return format is: {friend1, friend2, friend3, ...}

      Returns:
      Formatted string of user's friends.

    • getSolicitationsSent

    • getRecado

      public Errand getRecado() throws DontHaveErrandExcpetion

      Gets the oldest message from the user's queue of messages.

      Returns:
      Oldest message from the user's queue of messages.
      Throws:
      DontHaveErrandExcpetion - Exception thrown if the user has no messages in the queue.

      Parameters:

    • setAmigo

      public void setAmigo(User friend)

      Adds a friend to the user.

      Method used to load data from a file. Should not be used to add friends.

      Parameters:
      friend - Friend to be added.
